name: Losing Your Sheet
description:
Takes a moment to load. If the resolution is too high, please let me know.

Losing Your Sheet

Mouse Only, for instructions press the top left icon [?]

If you can reach a distance over 150 you've smashed it!

No the bucket really doesn't do anything...

LD50 Results

WOW! So pleased with these results :D amazing!

Dropped Features
  • Gold coins flying into the boat
  • Scooping up and rinsing the coins into a chest to collect them
  • Spending the coins on upgrades between lost sheets
  • Bird poo
  • Scaring off animals by throwing the sheet at them
  • An ending
  • Better looking skybox and water, well more time to draw everything would have been grand
  • The Bucket is a lost cause, it does nothing and never will.
Tools Used
  • Unity (3D Orthogonal)
  • Aseprite
  • Bosca Ceoil
  • Audacity
  • Visual Studio

The Unity project is full of spaghetti if you're hungry. If you have any questions about the project please ask.

Tutorial

Having never attempted water physics before, I have to share this tutorial by Code Monkey that helped me. It also touches nicely on camera to texture post processing.
